section.p: You encounter a young man who is beset by worries. He is glad to have someone to whom he can pour out his troubles. You learn he belongs to a warrior clan but is in disgrace because of cowardice. His family has told him not to come back until he has proved himself.

If you have a dead head, a pirate captain’s head or a ghoul’s head that you are willing (and able) to part with, .
